this comment it is just to say that alpha protocol have a DRM uniloc that means that is a DRM not so tough maybe as the ubisoft teorically speaking but still probably not that easy and what the differences between the ubisoft DRM and the uniloc : the ubisoft DRM need a permanent online state from the player in order to make the saves , the uniloc need to be registered in the start of the use of the game , so only at that moment you need the online state then to play the game is normal offline , now if anyone ask me if can be easy or not bypass the inicial identification to play the game that i can´t answer , so maybe not so tough in theory as the ubisoft DRM but can be tricky to work anyway .
